subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Judy Mayer, who is attending each day of the event in Indian Wells, Calif., for the 10th consecutive year, has followed the sport since she met Goran Ivanisevic in August 1994.
snippet: Judy Mayer, who is attending each day of the event in Indian Wells, Calif., for the 10th consecutive year, has followed the sport since she met Goran Ivanisevic in August 1994.
